name: Heatstroke
book: Pathfinder Companion: Sargava, the Lost Colony. Copyright 2010, Paizo Publishing, LLC
components: V, S, M (a drop of sweat)
text: A wavering red ray projects from your finger. You must succeed on a ranged touch attack with the ray to hit your target. The ray inflicts 1d4 points of nonlethal damage, causing the target to suffer from heatstroke as its body temperature dramatically increases. Except as noted above, this spell otherwise functions as ray of exhaustion. Characters wearing heavy clothing or armor of any sort take a –4 penalty on their saves.
components_zh: 语言，姿势，材料（一滴汗水）
savingThrow_zh: 强韧，通过则部分生效；见下
text_zh: 一道摇曳的红色射线从你的指尖射出。你需要进行一次远程接触攻击检定以命中目标。 射线对其造成1d4点非致命伤害，并且使目标的体温急剧增加，进入中暑状态。除了上述部分，本法术的工作方式如同一发力竭射线（ray of exhaustion）。 穿着厚重衣物或任何形式的盔甲的角色在对抗本法术的豁免检定中有-4罚值。
